name: ScamVerse
description: If there would be a high tech anti-virus that has an algorithm that can successfully detect phishing attacks and prevent it from accessing a person’s electronic device, this can be Detective Nemo. Even being a sophisticated anti-virus, Detective Nemo still needs your help on his first case, a possible phishing attack on the User’s laptop. Help him identify which is the real deal and which is the fake hiding in plain sight. In a virtual world like this, not everything is as it seems to be.
